thread.section_title: The Leon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: NYC Gem
thread.title_full: NYC Gem - Review of The Leon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: andrewmina02
title: NYC Gem
text: We decided to book after finding a good deal with a third party website and reading numerous positive reviews. We were not disappointed. This hotel is clean, modern, comfortable and the location was perfect for our 7 night stay to explore the city. The subway entrance is a short walk away, and the area showcases the diversity of NY. We felt safe and loved how Chinatown, Little Italy, the lower east side, financial district, and Brooklyn Bridge were all within walking distance. Staff were friendly and helpful - we have only good things to remember. It would be a natural choice to stay at the Leon Hotel if we have opportunity to visit NYC again.
